title: Enduring
description: Darkness is gathering around Family Justice. Babies, life changes, and leaps of faith bring a new normal to Bendover, but something dangerous hovers  A powerful force powered by rage and revenge has the entire family in the crosshairs.  Alex senses the disturbance but pinning it down is not so easy.  As summer in the desert fades to memory, a Justice tumbleweed will leave to start new chapter, a surprise in the heart of Family Justice offers a happy ever after no one saw coming, and an emotionally wounded vet will find what she needs to take back her life.  Life continues. Love grows. Broken hearts will be restored.  In this next chapter of the Family Justice saga, USA Today Bestselling Author, Suzanne Halliday takes readers on another captivating ride along with all the usual suspects! Humor, sexy times, and heart pounding excitement are what youâ€™ve come to expect in a Family Justice story and Enduring meets the challenge.  #FamilyJustice4Life  Author Note: Enduring is a full length 140k plus word book. As a thank you to my readers, for a limited time I have included Cupid in Heels at the back of the book! Cupid is currently unpublished and is only available as bonus material here until I change this file to remove it and republish it as a standalone.
author: Suzanne Halliday
